name: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2: Chara Pack 1 - Remilia Scarlet/Komeji Satori/Aki Sizuha/Tsukumo Benben/Yorigami Shion
summary: This DLC is an optional playable character pack for Touhou Blooming Chaos, including Remilia Scarlet, Komeji Satori, Aki Sizuha, Tsukumo Benben and Yorigami Shion. Once purchased, you may use them and all their color palettes in game immediately. Hope you enjoy.
